contest-event.event-date:
May 22, 1899 D East Grinstead Contest (First Section)
East Grinstead Contest (First Section) 10 Test Piece Contest East Grinstead Contest east-grinstead-contest-first-section
Falstaff
East Grinstead, Sussex 1st prize £7 and cornet. 2nd prize £5.10s. and tenor horn. March contest 1st (£1) Reading Temperance (The Elepant), 2nd (10s) East Grinstead(The Avenue), 3rd Steyning (Left Right). 3 bands competed.
April 13, 2012, 2:37 p.m. June 25, 2017, 10:49 a.m.
1 Reading Temperance W. Farr
2 Steyning J. Green
3 East Grinstead Town Unknown
Withdrawn 2nd Middlesex Volunteers Unknown
Withdrawn Redhill Farm School Unknown
